sentence.Network_en: The article is an attempt to defame an honest man.
sentence.Network_cn: 这篇文章旨在诋毁一个正直的人.

sentence.Network_en: We expect politicians to defame each other in an election year.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们预料政客们在选举年会互相诽谤.

sentence.Network_en: To attack the character or reputation of; speak ill of; defame.
sentence.Network_cn: 攻击人格或名誉; 说坏话; 诽谤.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... decode 破译 defame 诽谤，中伤 delimit 划定界限.
Barron_800小新完整版v1.1 - 豆丁网 ... decorum n. 端庄 defame v. 诋毁 deference n. 恭敬.
reputation 名声、声望defame 诬蔑、贬低amiable 宜人的、和善的
decree 命令defame 损毁名誉,诽谤default 缺乏,怠忽

list.abs: 而美国对诽谤（defamation）最简单的定义为：「对他人名誉上的攻击。」（Zelezny, 2004:114）名誉是他人看待一个人的眼光，也 …
...，在销售过程中产品介绍不当或违反有关承诺、保证以及商业诽谤（Business Defamation）等都被认为是不道德的销售行为。
法律英语词汇集锦... ... 非专业的 non-professional 诽谤罪 crime of defamation 隔地犯 offense of segregation by location.
国外或称为“诽谤法”（defamation law），本文视上下文语境同义使用这两个术语。 　　公共利益（public interest）在不同场合含义是不同 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French diffamer, from Latin diffamare 'spread evil report', from dis- (expressing removal) + fama 'report'

entry.def: If someone defames another person or thing, they say bad and untrue things about them.

example.ex: Sgt Norwood complained that the article defamed him.
example.tran: 诺伍德中士申诉说这篇文章对他进行了诽谤。

means.word_mean: 1. charge falsely or with malicious intent; attack the good name and reputation of someone;

sentences.sentence: "The journalists have defamed me!" "The article in the paper sullied my reputation"

auth_sentence.content: There is no point trying to defame Darwin.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no point trying to defame Darwin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no point trying to defame Darwin.

auth_sentence.content: I am not going to allow anyone to defame the name of United Russia.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am not going to allow anyone to defame the name of United Russia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am not going to allow anyone to defame the name of United Russia.

auth_sentence.content: Entries must not breach any copyright, third-party rights, privacy or defame any company or individual.
auth_sentence.res_content: Entries must not breach any copyright, third-party rights, privacy or defame any company or individual.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Entries must not breach any copyright, third-party rights, privacy or defame any company or individual.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去"等; 2. 表示"使……成为,加强"等

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+struct结构+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: de使……成为,加强+fin界限+ition表名词→划出界限→定义
de使……成为+sign标志→使……成为标志→设计
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+celer速度+ate表动词→使速度变慢
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+code密码→去掉密码
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+fame名声→名声变坏→诽谤
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+forest森林→去掉森林
de去掉+lete→v.删除;擦掉
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+mobilize动员→反过来动员→复员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 剥夺……的国籍;解除国有化
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+nationalize国有化→v. 剥夺……的国籍;解除国有化
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+press压→向下压→压制
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+salt盐→去掉盐分
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+throne皇冠→去掉皇冠→退位
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+train火车→v.下火车
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+value价值→去掉价值
de使……成为,加强+limit限定→加强限定
de使……成为,加强+line线条+ate表动词→划线条→描画[轮廓]
de使……成为,加强+nude裸体的→成为裸体
de使……成为,加强+pict描画→成为画图→描绘
de使……成为,加强+sicc干+ate表动词→弄干
de使……成为+sign标志→使……成为标志→设计

sentences.en: They’ve been defaming us for years.
sentences.cn: 多年来他们一直在中伤我们。
